workspace_dir.name: Workspace
workspace_dir.about: The folder where all intermediate and output files of the model will be written.  If this folder does not exist, it will be created.

results_suffix.name: File suffix
results_suffix.about: A string that will be added to the end of all files written to the workspace.

n_workers.name: Taskgraph n_workers parameter
n_workers.about: The n_workers parameter to provide to taskgraph. -1 will cause all jobs to run synchronously. 0 will run all jobs in the same process, but scheduling will take place asynchronously. Any other positive integer will cause that many processes to be spawned to execute tasks.

lulc_cur_path.about: A GDAL-supported raster representing the land-cover of thecurrent scenario.
lulc_cur_path.name: Current Land Use/Land Cover

calc_sequestration.about: Check to enable sequestration analysis. This requires inputs of Land Use/Land Cover maps for both current and future scenarios.
calc_sequestration.name: Calculate Sequestration

lulc_fut_path.about: A GDAL-supported raster representing the land-cover of the future scenario. If REDD scenario analysis is enabled, this should be the reference, or baseline, future scenario against which to compare the REDD policy scenario.
lulc_fut_path.name: Future Landcover

do_redd.about: Check to enable REDD scenario analysis.  This requires three Land Use/Land Cover maps: one for the current scenario, one for the future baseline scenario, and one for the future REDD policy scenario.
do_redd.name: REDD Scenario Analysis

lulc_redd_path.about: A GDAL-supported raster representing the land-cover of the REDD policy future scenario.  This scenario will be compared to the baseline future scenario.
lulc_redd_path.name: REDD Policy)

carbon_pools_path.about: A table that maps the land-cover IDs to carbon pools.  The table must contain columns of 'LULC', 'C_above', 'C_Below', 'C_Soil', 'C_Dead' as described in the User's Guide.  The values in LULC must at least include the LULC IDs in the land cover maps.
carbon_pools_path.name: Carbon Pools

lulc_cur_year.about: The calendar year of the current scenario.
lulc_cur_year.name: Current Landcover Calendar Year

lulc_fut_year.about: The calendar year of the future scenario.
lulc_fut_year.name: Future Landcover Calendar Year

do_valuation.about: if true then run the valuation model on available outputs.  At a minimum will run on carbon stocks, if sequestration with a future scenario is done and/or a REDD scenario calculate NPV for either and report in final HTML document.
do_valuation.name: Run Valuation Model

price_per_metric_ton_of_c.about: Is the present value of carbon per metric ton. Used if ``args['do_valuation']`` is present and True.
price_per_metric_ton_of_c.name: Price/Metric ton of carbon

discount_rate.about: The discount rate as a floating point percent.
discount_rate.name: Market Discount in Price of Carbon (%)

rate_change.about: The floating point percent increase of the price of carbon per year.
rate_change.name: Annual Rate of Change in Price of Carbon (%)
